description: Create and manipulate drawings with a simple canvas interface. Enhance your AI assistants by enabling them to draw filled shapes and export images effortlessly. Utilize this tool to bring visual creativity to your applications.

port.description: Port for the MCP server to listen on

capabilities.name: drawing_generateCanvas
capabilities.description: Generate a new drawing canvas with specified width and height.

capabilities.name: drawing_fillRectangle
capabilities.description: Fill a rectangle on the drawing canvas with a specified color and coordinates.

capabilities.name: drawing_getCanvasPng
capabilities.description: Get the current drawing canvas as a PNG image (base64 encoded).

capabilities.name: drawing_getCanvasData
capabilities.description: Get the current pixel data of the drawing canvas as JSON.
